mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.`perms` FROM `sys_role_menu` rm LEFT JOIN `sys_menu` m ON m.`id` = rm.`menu_id` WHERE rm.`role_id` = ( SELECT r.`id` FROM t_user u RIGHT JOIN sys_role r ON r.`department_id` = u.`department_id` AND r.`title_id` = u.`title_id` WHERE u.id = #{userId}) AND m.`menu_type` = 'F' AND m.`status` = '1' AND m.`del_flag` = 0

SELECT DISTINCT m.id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.path, m.component, m.visible, m.status, IFNULL(m.perms,'') AS perms, m.is_frame, m.menu_type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time FROM `sys_menu` m WHERE m.`menu_type` IN ('C','M') AND m.`status` = '1' AND m.`del_flag` = 0 ORDER BY m.parent_id,m.order_num

SELECT DISTINCT m.id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.path, m.component, m.visible, m.status, IFNULL(m.perms,'') AS perms, m.is_frame, m.menu_type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time FROM `sys_role_menu` rm LEFT JOIN `sys_menu` m ON m.`id` = rm.`menu_id` WHERE rm.`role_id` = ( SELECT r.`id` FROM t_user u RIGHT JOIN sys_role r ON r.`department_id` = u.`department_id` AND r.`title_id` = u.`title_id` WHERE u.id = #{userId}) AND m.`menu_type` IN ('C','M') AND m.`status` = '1' AND m.`del_flag` = 0 ORDER BY m.parent_id,m.order_num
